oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers; Veterans; Patriotic societies; Older people
United Confederate Veterans, Tennessee Division; Unicoi County (Tenn.)
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elbert L. Bailey of Unicoi County, Tennessee. He is seated in a chair in the front yard of a house.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: United Daughters of the Confederacy, Rosalie Blankenship Brown Chapter Scrapbook, 1922-1947
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Elbert L. Bailey was born April 4, 1845. He was the last surviving Confederate soldier living in Unicoi County, Tennessee.
